mapper.insert: insert into transport( employeeID, workMonth, startDate, startStation, endStation, transportFacility, transportExpense1, midStation1, transportFacility1, midStation2, midStation3, transport, businessTrip, status, insertDate ) values ( #{employeeID}, #{workMonth}, #{startDate}, #{startStation}, #{endStation}, #{transportFacility}, #{transportExpense1}, #{midStation1}, #{transportFacility1}, #{midStation2}, #{midStation3}, #{transport}, #{businessTrip}, '0', date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') )
mapper.select: select t.workMonth, t.startDate, t.startStation, t.endStation, t.transportFacility, t.transportExpense1, t.midStation1, t.transportFacility1, t.midStation2, t.midStation3, t.transport, t.businessTrip from ems.transport t where t.employeeID = #{employeeID} order by t.workMonth DESC limit 1
mapper.update: update transport set employeeID=#{employeeID}, workMonth=#{workMonth}, startDate#{startDate}, startStation=#{startStation}, endStation=#{endStation}, transportFacility=#{transportFacility}, transportExpense1=#{transportExpense1}, midStation1=#{midStation1}, transportFacility1=#{transportFacility1}, midStation2=#{midStation2}, midStation3=#{midStation3}, transport#{transport}, businessTrip=#{businessTrip}, status='0', insertDate=date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') where t.employeeID = #{employeeID} AND t.workMonth = #{workMonth}
